sections.value: Hey, I’m Sarthak. I'm a UMich alum (Go Blue!) in New York City. I started my career as a software engineer because I love building things and understanding how systems really work. Over time, I wanted to know why we build the things we do, so I went back to school for my MBA at NYU. Now, I’m passionate about the intersection of technology and business, and how we can leverage both to create meaningful impact.

I currently work as a product manager at Capital One. I focus on building data-driven, scalable products in our enterprise space. In my personal time I'm a huge foodie and love exploring new restaurants and cafés around the world.
